mapper.select: select go.*, od.o_d_no, od.o_d_product_count, od.product_no, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_image, p.product_desc, p.product_sale_count, p.product_click_count, p.c_no, p.product_order, p.product_isonsale, p.product_discountrate, p.product_sale_date from gukbap_order go left outer join order_detail od on go.order_no = od.order_no left outer join product p on od.product_no = p.product_no where go.user_id = #{user_id}

select go.*, od.o_d_no, od.o_d_product_count, od.product_no, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_image, p.product_desc, p.product_sale_count, p.product_click_count, p.c_no, p.product_order, p.product_isonsale, p.product_discountrate, p.product_sale_date from gukbap_order go join order_detail od on go.order_no = od.order_no join product p on od.product_no = p.product_no WHERE go.ORDER_NO=#{order_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gukbap_order (order_no, order_date, order_status, order_total_price, order_desc, order_note, user_id) VALUES (gukbap_order_order_no_SEQ.nextval, to_date(#{order_date}, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), #{order_status},#{order_total_price}, #{order_desc},#{order_note},#{user_id})
mapper.update: update gukbap_order set order_status=#{order_status}, order_date = sysdate, order_total_price=#{order_total_price}, order_desc=#{order_desc}, order_note=#{order_note} WHERE order_no=#{order_no}
